content:
Howdy!  I am a Visiting Assistant Professor in the Marketing Department at the Kelley School of Business, Indiana University. My current research focuses on Business-to-Business Marketing, Sales Management, and Social Impact of Marketing.
I received my Ph.D. in Business Administration (Marketing) from the Mays Business School, Texas A&M University, co-advised by Hari Sridhar (Texas A&M University) and Vikas Mittal (Rice University).
At IU, I teach Marketing Research and Intro to Marketing at the undergraduate level. During my doctoral studies, I have taught Marketing Analytics to the undergraduate students at the Mays Business School, winning the Dean’s Award for Outstanding Teaching.
 Download my CV.--
summary: Howdy!  I am a Visiting Assistant Professor in the Marketing Department at the Kelley School of Business, Indiana University. My current research focuses on Business-to-Business Marketing, Sales Management, and Social Impact of Marketing.
title: Muzeeb Shaik
